Class GetCommentsTask

java.lang.Object
  ca.ualberta.cmput301w14t08.geochan.tasks.GetCommentsTask
All Implemented Interfaces:
GetCommentListRunnableInterface, GetCommentsRunnableInterface, TaskInterface
public class GetCommentsTask
extends java.lang.Object
implements TaskInterface, GetCommentListRunnableInterface, GetCommentsRunnableInterface

Responsible for the task of controlling the runnables that are responsible for the various parts of getting all the Comments in a ThreadComment.

Author:
Artem Herasymchuk
